scripts.dev: npx concurrently "sass src/styles/style.scss public/assets/styles/style.css --watch" "nodemon --watch src/scripts -e js --exec \"npm run build:js\"" "nodemon --watch src/images --exec \"mkdir -p public/assets/images && cp -r src/images/* public/assets/images/\"" "nodemon --watch src/audio --exec \"mkdir -p public/assets/audio && cp -r src/audio/* public/assets/audio/\"" "nodemon src/scripts/server.js"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run build:audio
